image.altText: Reserve Bank sign overlaid with inflation chart

props.synopsis: The RBA has cut interest rates to 3.6 per cent. Follow the day's events and insights from our business reporters on the ABC News live markets blog.Â

title.children: Reserve Bank cuts cash rate to 3.6 per cent

image.altText: Michele Bullock stands at podium

props.synopsis: The Reserve Bank's economic outlook suggests further room to cut interest rates, but it's not all good news for most working-age Australians.

title.children: Markets expect the cash rate to fall below 3pc, and the RBA can live with that

image.altText: A woman wearing a denim jacket sitting at a desk with a microphone.

props.synopsis: Former member of the Australian National University council Liz Allen has used a Senate inquiry investigating university governance to allege Chancellor Julie Bishop harassed, bullied, and threatened her.

title.children: Julie Bishop accused of bullying by ANU staff member, senate inquiry hears

image.altText: A close up of Sussan Ley.

props.synopsis: Opposition Leader Sussan Ley says the Coalition would revoke recognition of Palestinian statehood if re-elected. Follow live.

title.children: Coalition would undo Palestinian recognition if elected

liveBlogKeyEvents.title: Chalmers says it's 'disappointing' Coalition won't play constructive role on Palestine

Coalition would revoke recognition of Palestine if elected

image.altText: Benjamin Netanyahu speaks into a microphone.

props.synopsis: While the Israeli government resents countries such as Australia recognising a Palestinian state, it is more of an irritant than a substantial setback.Â

title.children: The West's actions are still falling short of real pressure on Israel

image.altText: Anthony Albanese stands next to Penny Wong.

props.synopsis: The comment came a day after Benjamin Netanyahu rebuked Australia's move to join France, the United Kingdom, and Canada in recognising Palestinian statehood.

title.children: Albanese takes swipe at 'in denial' Israeli prime minister

image.altText: an elegant  woman with short, grey hair wearing a green shirt and smart jacket.

props.synopsis: Greens leader Rosalie Woodruff announces the party cannot back Tasmanian Labor's bid to form minority government "at this stage" â with Labor's Dean Winter warning of job cuts under the "Abetz, Rockliff" Liberals.

title.children: Greens withhold support for Labor's bid for Tasmanian government 'at this stage'

image.altText: Erin Patterson looks at the camera as she sits in the back of a prison van

props.synopsis: A Victorian judge says prosecutors were seeking to use "dubious" arguments to convict Erin Patterson of poisoning her husband before the Crown abandoned its case.

title.children: Dropped Erin Patterson poisoning charges were 'dubious', judge says

image.altText: Matt Wright has brown hair and is wearing a button-up shirt as he walks towards the court.

props.synopsis: The helicopter pilot in the crash that killed Netflix star Chris "Willow" Wilson says Matt Wright's employees idolised him and would follow his directions to disconnect chopper flight recorders. Follow the trial live.

title.children: Pilot in fatal chopper crash says workers did 'whatever' Matt Wright said

liveBlogKeyEvents.title: Pilot 'intentionally disconnected' Chris Wilson, could have been 'severely worse'
In flight photo shows fuel tanks 'three quarters full'
'Were you a raging cocaine junkie, Mr Robinson?'

image.altText: a composite image of Alex Greenwich and Mark Latham

props.synopsis: In a case before the NSW Civil and Administrative Tribunal, MP Alex Greenwich alleges four public statements by the former One Nation state leader constituted unlawful homosexual vilification and sexual harassment in the workplace.

title.children: Sydney MP tells tribunal Latham has 'abusive obsession' with him

image.altText: Donald Trump speaks at the White House while holding a paper showing a graph.

props.synopsis: Donald Trump says his administration is seizing control of the Washington DC police department and deploying the National Guard to crack down on local crime and "clear" the city of homelessness.

title.children: Trump activates National Guard in Washington, takes over local police

image.altText: An illustration of a young boy staring at a computer. He is surrounded by text bubbles.

props.synopsis: An investigation by triple j hack uncovers allegations of young people in Australia being sexually harassed and even encouraged to take their own life by AI chatbots.

title.children: Young Australian hospitalised after ChatGPT use

image.altText: David Crisafulli COVID vaccine

props.synopsis: Deputy Premier Jarrod Bleijie has told reporters whether he has had a flu vaccination is "between me and my doctor".

title.children: Top Queensland politicians won't reveal flu vax status amid low uptake

image.altText: The Star, Brisbane 2025-01-09 10:01:00

props.synopsis: The group has signed an on-again, off-again deal with its Hong Kong-based partners for the riverside venue in the Queensland capital, bringing it back from the brink of financial calamity.

title.children: Star offloads Brisbane's Queen's Wharf in takeover deal

image.altText: A woman in a bedazzled jumpsuit

props.synopsis: The US singer's new album will be called The Life of a Showgirl, with the 35-year-old announcing it on her official website with an orange glittery backdrop.

title.children: Taylor Swift announces new album after mysterious countdown

image.altText: Bright white bleached coral underwater.

props.synopsis: In Western Australia, the damage to coral reefs including the World Heritage-listed Ningaloo has eclipsed any previous bleaching events.Â

title.children: From 'hope spot' to 'skeletons': Ningaloo's 'catastrophic' event

image.altText: a large, red and white passenger ferry in dock

props.synopsis: The 212-metre-long ship has arrived in Australian waters after a six-week voyage from Europe â but it will still be more than a week before it is expected to reach Hobart.

title.children: Spirit of Tasmania IV arrives in Australia after voyage from Scotland

image.altText: Police cars parked on an empty highway with road signs pointing to Wollongbar and TAFE in the background.

props.synopsis: In just four days, seven people have lost their lives in separate crashes across the state.

title.children: Horror crashes put NSW road toll on track to be worst in 15 years

image.altText: A young Palestinian man in a press vest and helmet speaks into a microphone featuring the Al Jazeera logo.

props.synopsis: Palestinian journalist Anas al-Sharif predicted his own death, believing he'd been targeted by an IDF smear campaign as a precursor for his assassination. On Monday his premonition came true, when he was killed by Israeli forces alongside four of his Al Jazeera colleagues.

title.children: 'Israel has succeeded': Final words from journalist killed in Gaza

image.altText: carpentaria grasswren

props.synopsis: The research examined bird data over a 70 year period, and found a near 40 per cent decline in the overall abundance of 3,000 tropical species worldwide.Â

title.children: Extreme heat a factor in decline of tropical bird populations, study finds

image.altText: Collage of Good Things 2025 acts against cloudy blue sky: Weezer, Garbage, Tool

props.synopsis:
Good Things brings another bumper line-up of alt-rock, metal, punk, and more to the east coast this December, including Wheezer, Garbage, Tool and more.

Â

title.children: One of Australia's biggest and loudest festivals is back

image.altText: Geoff Pearson stands in a paddock with cattle behind him

props.synopsis: A cattle farmer says he's been unable to stock one of his paddocks for three years because hunters keep cutting fences which let his livestock out.

title.children: 'Endless' trespassers cost farmers thousands and endanger life

image.altText: A woman in a suit looks down the barrel of the camera.

props.synopsis: A 25-year-old woman is speaking out years after she was allegedly sexually harassed by her boss at a Mexican restaurant, after the Federal Court this month ordered he pay her a record $305,000.

title.children: Record sexual harassment payout after boss allegedly shows porn, sex toys to worker

image.altText: Ethan Guo sits in the cockpit of a plane.

props.synopsis: Ethan Guo made headlines when he set off in an attempt to become the youngest person to fly solo to all seven continents, but authorities say he landed in Chilean territory without permission.

title.children: US influencer stranded at military base in Antarctica after landing without permission

image.altText: A middle-aged woman and man standing outside gold automatic sliding doors

props.synopsis: South Australia's District Court has apologised for an error which incorrectly recorded a guilty finding in the blackmail case against former Labor MP Annabel Digance and her husband.

title.children: Court apologises for error in blackmail case against former MP

image.altText: A man with short dark hair wearing black sunglasses and a black top holds a red AFL football on a film set.

props.synopsis: The international hip-hop artist has been announced as the pre-game entertainment for the 2025 AFL grand final.

title.children: Snoop Dogg to entertain MCG crowd at the AFL grand final

image.altText: Brahman cattle in field.

props.synopsis: A gutted north-west Queensland grazier warns others to vaccinate against blackleg, after nearly 40 of his cattle die of the deadly soil-borne disease.

title.children: Cause of cattle death shocks north Queensland grazier

image.altText: Writer and comedian Sashi Perera travelled to Sri Lanka to participate in the Galle Literary festival.

props.synopsis: Last year, I was horrified to realise that I was a tourist in my country of birth. Large swathes of Sri Lanka felt foreign after my father died. So, after an awful few years, I took a timeout from my Melbourne life and mapped out a four-month travel plan.

title.children: After spending months in my country of birth, it no longer feels foreign

image.altText: Underwater shot of researchers holding dugong.

props.synopsis: The world's largest health study of dugongs in Moreton Bay provides critical clues for helping conserve the enigmatic marine mammal, especially in other locations where numbers are falling.

title.children: Scientists uncover the secret lives of dugongs in Moreton Bay

image.altText: Ezra Mam of the Broncos leaves the field with an injury, helped by a trainer

props.synopsis: The Brisbane Broncos name a new halves pairing for this weekend's crucial derby against the Dolphins, after injury chaos hit the club last weekend, with captain Adam Reynolds among those missing.

title.children: Broncos name new halves pairing after triple-hamstring blow

image.altText: A woman and man shake hands standing in front of flags smiling at the camera

props.synopsis: The Nakamal Agreement will cover infrastructure, climate change resilience and economic development, but details on travel and visa arrangements between the two countries remain under wraps.

title.children: Australia close to signing 'ambitious' pact with Vanuatu worth $500m

image.altText: Two large boats collide near a third vessel which they are chasing on open ocean

props.synopsis: Video shows the moment a Chinese vessel hits the front of the other while on the open sea.

title.children: Fate of Chinese crew unknown after dramatic collision in South China Sea
